abstract: The government announced plans Friday to expand purchases of the student loans it backs in an effort to head off a potential shortfall next year, The New York Times’s Jonathan D. Glater and Eric Dash reported.
lead_paragraph: The government announced plans Friday to expand purchases of the student loans it backs in an effort to head off a potential shortfall next year, The New York Times’s Jonathan D. Glater and Eric Dash reported.

headline.main: U.S. Will Buy More Student Loans
